name: GitHub (Remote PAT)
description: Interact with GitHub repositories, issues, pull requests, actions, and code security through GitHub's hosted remote MCP server. Authenticates with a Personal Access Token.

inputs.label: GitHub Personal Access Token
inputs.description: PAT sent as Bearer token to the GitHub remote MCP server. Requires repo and read:org scopes.

obtain.instructions:
1. Click 'Generate new token (classic)'
2. Give it a name like 'McpMux'
3. Select scopes: repo, read:org
4. Click 'Generate token'
5. Copy the token (starts with ghp_)

auth.instructions: Create a personal access token at https://github.com/settings/tokens with repo and read:org scopes
